00581 template <typename T, typename U>
00582 class ConstMap
00583 {
00584   public:
00586     ConstMap(const T& key, const U& val)
00587     {
00588         m_[key] = val;
00589     }
00591     ConstMap<T, U>& operator()(const T& key, const U& val)
00592     {
00593         m_[key] = val;
00594         return *this;
00595     }
00597     operator std::map<T, U>() { return m_; }
00599     U operator [](const T& key) const
00600     {
00601         typename std::map<T,U>::const_iterator it = m_.find(key);
00602         if (it==m_.end())
00603             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Value not found");
00604         return (*it).second;
00605     }
00606   private:
00607     std::map<T, U> m_;
00608 };

00610 template <typename T>
00611 MxArray::MxArray(const std::vector<T>& v) : p_(mxCreateCellMatrix(1, v.size()))
00612 {
00613     if (!p_)
00614         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00615     for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i)
00616         mxSetCell(const_cast<mxArray*>(p_), i, MxArray(v[i]));
00617 }

00619 template <typename T>
00620 MxArray::MxArray(const cv::Point_<T>& p) :
00621     p_(mxCreateNumericMatrix(1, 2, mxDOUBLE_CLASS,mxREAL))
00622 {
00623     if (!p_)
00624         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00625     double *x = mxGetPr(p_);
00626     x[0] = p.x;
00627     x[1] = p.y;
00628 }

00636     double *x = mxGetPr(p_);
00637     x[0] = p.x;

00666 template <typename T>
00667 MxArray::MxArray(const cv::Scalar_<T>& s) :
00668     p_(mxCreateNumericMatrix(1, 4, mxDOUBLE_CLASS,mxREAL))
00669 {
00670     if (!p_)
00671         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Allocation error");
00672     double *x = mxGetPr(p_);
00673     x[0] = s[0];
00674     x[1] = s[1];
00675     x[2] = s[2];
00676     x[3] = s[3];
00677 }

00679 template <typename T>
00680 cv::Point_<T> MxArray::toPoint_() const
00681 {
00682     if (!isNumeric() || numel()!=2)
00683         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not a Point");
00684     return cv::Point_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1));
00685 }
00686 
00687 template <typename T>
00688 cv::Point3_<T> MxArray::toPoint3_() const
00689 {
00690     if (!isNumeric() || numel()!=3)
00691         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not a Point");
00692     return cv::Point3_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1), at<T>(2));
00693 }

00695 template <typename T>
00696 cv::Size_<T> MxArray::toSize_() const
00697 {
00698     if (!isNumeric() || numel()!=2)
00699         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00700                           "MxArray is incompatible to cv::Size");
00701     return cv::Size_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1));
00702 }
00703 
00704 template <typename T>
00705 cv::Rect_<T> MxArray::toRect_() const
00706 {
00707     if (!isNumeric() || numel()!=4)
00708         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00709                           "MxArray is incompatible to cv::Rect");
00710     return cv::Rect_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1), at<T>(2), at<T>(3));
00711 }
00712 
00713 template <typename T>
00714 cv::Scalar_<T> MxArray::toScalar_() const
00715 {
00716     int n = numel();
00717     if (!isNumeric() || n < 1 || 4 < n)
00718         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00719                           "MxArray is incompatible to cv::Scalar");
00720     switch (n)
00721     {
00722         case 1: return cv::Scalar_<T>(at<T>(0));
00723         case 2: return cv::Scalar_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1));
00724         case 3: return cv::Scalar_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1), at<T>(2));
00725         case 4: return cv::Scalar_<T>(at<T>(0), at<T>(1), at<T>(2), at<T>(3));
00726     }
00727 }
00728 
00729 template <typename T>
00730 std::vector<T> MxArray::toVector() const
00731 {
00732     int n = numel();
00733     std::vector<T> vt(n);
00734     if (isNumeric())
00735         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00736             vt[i] = at<T>(i);
00737     else if (isCell())
00738         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00739             vt[i] = MxArray(mxGetCell(p_, i)).at<T>(0);
00740     else
00741         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Cannot convert to std::vector");
00742     return vt;
00743 }
00744 
00745 template <typename T>
00746 std::vector<T> MxArray::toVector(std::const_mem_fun_ref_t<T,MxArray> f) const
00747 {
00748     std::vector<MxArray> v = toVector<MxArray>();
00749     std::vector<T> vt;
00750     vt.reserve(v.size());
00751     for (std::vector<MxArray>::iterator it=v.begin(); it<v.end(); ++it)
00752         vt.push_back(f(*it));
00753     return vt;
00754 }

00756 template <typename T>
00757 T MxArray::at(mwIndex index) const
00758 {
00759     if (!p_ || numel() <= index)
00760         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Accessing invalid range");
00761     switch (classID())
00762     {
00763         case mxCHAR_CLASS:
00764             return static_cast<T>(*(mxGetChars(p_)+index));
00765         case mxDOUBLE_CLASS:
00766             return static_cast<T>(*(mxGetPr(p_)+index));
00767         case mxINT8_CLASS:
00768             return static_cast<T>(
00769                 *(reinterpret_cast<int8_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00770         case mxUINT8_CLASS:
00771             return static_cast<T>(
00772                 *(reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00773         case mxINT16_CLASS:
00774             return static_cast<T>(
00775                 *(reinterpret_cast<int16_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00776         case mxUINT16_CLASS:
00777             return static_cast<T>(
00778                 *(reinterpret_cast<uint16_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00779         case mxINT32_CLASS:
00780             return static_cast<T>(
00781                 *(reinterpret_cast<int32_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00782         case mxUINT32_CLASS:
00783             return static_cast<T>(
00784                 *(reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00785         case mxINT64_CLASS:
00786             return static_cast<T>(
00787                 *(reinterpret_cast<int64_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00788         case mxUINT64_CLASS:
00789             return static_cast<T>(
00790                 *(reinterpret_cast<uint64_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00791         case mxSINGLE_CLASS:
00792             return static_cast<T>(
00793                 *(reinterpret_cast<float*>(mxGetData(p_))+index));
00794         case mxLOGICAL_CLASS:
00795             return static_cast<T>(*(mxGetLogicals(p_)+index));
00796         case mxCELL_CLASS:
00797         case mxSTRUCT_CLASS:
00798         case mxFUNCTION_CLASS:
00799         default:
00800             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not primitive");
00801             return static_cast<T>(0);
00802     }
00803 }

00805 template <typename T>
00806 T MxArray::at(mwIndex i, mwIndex j) const
00807 {
00808     return at<T>(subs(i,j));
00809 }

00811 template <typename T>
00812 T MxArray::at(const std::vector<mwIndex>& si) const
00813 {
00814     return at<T>(subs(si));
00815 }

00817 template <typename T>
00818 void MxArray::set(mwIndex index, const T& value)
00819 {
00820     if (index < 0 || numel() <= index)
00821         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "Accessing invalid range");
00822     switch (classID())
00823     {
00824         case mxCHAR_CLASS:
00825             *(mxGetChars(p_)+index) = static_cast<mxChar>(value); break;
00826         case mxDOUBLE_CLASS:
00827             *(mxGetPr(p_)+index) = static_cast<double>(value); break;
00828         case mxINT8_CLASS:
00829             *(reinterpret_cast<int8_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00830                 static_cast<int8_t>(value); break;
00831         case mxUINT8_CLASS:
00832             *(reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00833                 static_cast<uint8_t>(value); break;
00834         case mxINT16_CLASS:
00835             *(reinterpret_cast<int16_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00836                 static_cast<int16_t>(value); break;
00837         case mxUINT16_CLASS:
00838             *(reinterpret_cast<uint16_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00839                 static_cast<uint16_t>(value); break;
00840         case mxINT32_CLASS:
00841             *(reinterpret_cast<int32_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00842                 static_cast<int32_t>(value); break;
00843         case mxUINT32_CLASS:
00844             *(reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00845                 static_cast<uint32_t>(value); break;
00846         case mxINT64_CLASS:
00847             *(reinterpret_cast<int64_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00848                 static_cast<int64_t>(value); break;
00849         case mxUINT64_CLASS:
00850             *(reinterpret_cast<uint64_t*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00851                 static_cast<uint64_t>(value); break;
00852         case mxSINGLE_CLASS:
00853             *(reinterpret_cast<float*>(mxGetData(p_))+index) =
00854                 static_cast<float>(value); break;
00855         case mxLOGICAL_CLASS:
00856             *(mxGetLogicals(p_)+index) = static_cast<mxLogical>(value); break;
00857         case mxCELL_CLASS:
00858             mxSetCell(const_cast<mxArray*>(p_), index, MxArray(value)); break;
00859         case mxSTRUCT_CLASS:
00860         case mxFUNCTION_CLASS:
00861         default:
00862             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray type is not valid");
00863     }
00864 }

00866 template <typename T>
00867 void MxArray::set(mwIndex i, mwIndex j, const T& value)
00868 {
00869     set<T>(subs(i,j),value);
00870 }

00872 template <typename T>
00873 void MxArray::set(const std::vector<mwIndex>& si, const T& value)
00874 {
00875     set<T>(subs(si),value);
00876 }
00877 
00878 template <typename T>
00879 void MxArray::set(const std::string& fieldName, const T& value, mwIndex index)
00880 {
00881     if (!isStruct())
00882         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error", "MxArray is not struct");
00883     if (!isField(fieldName))
00884     {
00885         if (mxAddField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p_), fieldName.c_str())<0)
00886             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00887                               "Failed to create a field '%s'",
00888                               fieldName.c_str());
00889     }
00890     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p_), index, fieldName.c_str(),
00891                static_cast<mxArray*>(MxArray(value)));
00892 }
